## Summoner.live property

Get the summoner's live game data.

Uses [CurrentGameManager.fetch()](./shieldbow.currentgamemanager.fetch.md) to get the details.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get live(): Promise<CurrentGame>;
```
